attributes.action: introduce the death penalty for murder, paedophilia and other serious offences
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm sick and tired of criminals getting away with a slap on the wrist. I say hanging for murder rape paedopilia drug dealing and any crime used to fund a drugs habit i.e using stolen credit cards stealing tom toms from cars ect

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
